rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming area with a Vastu-compliant north-east corner entry for positive energy. Features a reception desk and storage space.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open space with Mediterranean design accents, seating area, built-in entertainment system. Openings: large windows facing south-west to capture natural light while ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, designed as a semi-open space. Windows oriented for adequate ventilation and Vastu balance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully-equipped modern kitchen with an open layout adjoining the dining area. Features proper lighting and Vastu-aligned east window for freshness and energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room on the ground floor with a balcony facing north-west to maximize morning light as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space, quiet area located towards the west for concentration. Equipped with a glass partition to ensure separation while maintaining an open feel.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: Spacious balcony attached to living room and guest bedroom, designed with Vastu principles ensuring good air circulation and light.
